TopicTitle: (fixed)Lost control of spacecraft around sun, but comm network is not enabled

Articles.Content:
I lost control of a probe going around the sun on career mode even though I have the Comm Network option turned off. Do I still need to worry about distance in career mode even though this option is not enabled?

Edited June 7, 2019 by RYU AZUKU99
figured out the sniz

I don’t know the answer to your question sorry, since I always play with commnet, but to check the obvious, you haven’t run out of electric power by any chance? Apologies if you’ve already checked that
No i still have electric charge

13 hours ago, RYU AZUKU99 said:

Do I still need to worry about distance in career mode even though this option is not enabled?

No.  With CommNet turned off you should be able to operate a probe anywhere.  

Perhaps your probe core accidentally got put into hibernation?  (Should be able to see it via right-click).  Or perhaps your battery still has charge, but has been set to off/locked?

Posting a screenshot might help identify any other possible issues.
After messing around with my game I tried out saving the game(not quicksaving), then reloading and that seemed to have fixed the issue.
